name: Another world (itch) (Evenry, Heopjek, heibon)
description:
Welcome to the "Another world"! In this world, the fastest runners survive. As a runner, you must get to the portal as quickly as possible. But there is no need to relax, because a poisonous cloud is chasing you, from which a chemical suit will not protect you.

There are problems with the work of leaderboard on the WebGL version.In the future, an exe version will be uploaded and WebGl will be updated. Sorry :c

If you still want to play with leaderboard , then here is the link https://evenry.itch.io/another-world-leaderboard

Control:

Button "A" - move to the left side.

Button "D" - move to the right side.

Button "Space" -  jump.

Button "Shift" - change level to another various option. (you can change this in menu)
